com.ning.metrics.serialization.event
Class SmileBucketEvent

java.lang.Object
  com.ning.metrics.serialization.event.SmileBucketEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Event, Externalizable, Serializable
public class SmileBucketEvent
extends Object
implements Event

A meta-event wrapping a collector of Smile events of the same type and same granularity. This is used for serializing, to leverage compression (back-references) that Smile offers.

See Also:

getSerializedEvent

public byte[] getSerializedEvent()
Serialize an event to a byte array. This method is optional, methods relying on this call should handle gracefully null. Only serializes the data, not the event metadata.

Specified by:
getSerializedEvent in interface Event
Returns:
byte array representation of an event, can return null
